plugin.name: CustomBrowse
plugin.title: Custom Browse
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Custom Browse is available for unlicensed users.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomClock
plugin.title: Custom Clock Helper (incl. Custom Clock)
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Custom Clock Helper is available for unlicensed users. Custom Clock Helper and Custom Clock uses the same license, so you will always get a license for both when buying one of them.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomScan
plugin.title: Custom Scan
plugin.desc: The LastFM scanning module is available free of charge, the other scanning modules provided by Custom Scan requires a license and isn't available to unlicensed users.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomSkip
plugin.title: Custom Skip
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Custom Skip is available for unlicensed users.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: DatabaseQuery
plugin.title: Database Query
plugin.desc: Currently free of charge but you can make a voluntary payment now to encourage further development
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: DynamicPlayList
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlist
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Dynamic Playlist is available for unlicensed users. Note that Dynamic Playlist is included for free if you purchase a license to SQL Playlist plugin.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: MultiLibrary
plugin.title: Multi Library
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in MultiLibrary is available for unlicensed users.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: SQLPlayList
plugin.title: SQL Playlist (Incl. Dynamic Playlist)
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality is available to unlicensed users. If you pay for SQL Playlist you currently get Dynamic Playlist plugin for free during the same license period.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: TitleSwitcher
plugin.title: Title Switcher
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Title Switcher is available for unlicensed users.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: TrackStat
plugin.title: TrackStat
plugin.desc: Changing and viewing rating for a single song is currently free of charge but this might change in the future. All possibilities to browse TrackStat data, import/export to iTunes/MusicIP, dynamic playlists and statistic related Custom Skip filters and Custom Browse menus will require a license already now.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson
